name: Parallel [FIXED]
description:
Controls:

Esc - Pause

E - Interact

A/Right arrow key - Move Right

D/Left arrow key - Move Left

TAB - Swap Character

The theme is very Sci-fiction. Thanks for reading and (hopefully) playing!

Are we Beginners?

This is our first ever game! We are a team of 6, only 4 of which who are actively studying games design. We have been studying for just over a year.

Game Engine:

We have used Unity to create this game.

Theme of "Two":

The game switches between the perspective of two robots.

Assets we Used:

Main Theme/ Music https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WyGeDKVjloo&list=PLyNjz38eJtj5IAaTD9vCNQJZosTsBTbYs&index=7

UI Sounds/Ambience https://www.gamedevmarket.net/asset/interface-sfx-9059/

Pixel art space background https://twitter.com/norma_2d
